name: CV_CHILD_RES
description: Table to contain child results for any parent result. Each result can have multiple child results. For example, documentation on main vessel will create parent result record while documenting on lesion or collateral will create child result record for that parent result.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CHILD_RES_ID
columns.description: Indicates the result ID. Each result could have multiple child result records.
